DOC.criteria: Adult woman ( ≥ 18 year age ) metastatic locally advanced breast cancer Histological cytological confirmation ER+ and/or PR+ breast cancer A representative tumor specimen must available molecular testing . Postmenopausal woman . Postmenopausal status define either : Age ≥ 18 prior bilateral oophorectomy Age ≥ 60 year Age < 60 year amenorrhea least 12 month folliclestimulating hormone ( FSH ) estradiol level postmenopausal range ( accord local laboratory ) Recurrence , within 12 month end adjuvant treatment letrozole anastrozole , Progression , within one month end letrozole anastrozole treatment locally advance metastatic breast cancer . ECOG Performance Status 01 . Fasting serum cholesterol ≤ 300 mg/dl 7.75 mmol/L fast triglyceride ≤ 2.5 × ULN .
